name: unwarranted
content:

not having a good reason and therefore annoying or unfair: People need to be protected against such unwarranted intrusions into their private lives by journalists. Synonyms

groundless

lacking a good reason; unnecessary: They denounced the investigation as an unwarranted interference with their business.
